known_issues: Android APK generation/build pipeline may not be supported on the current platform (may require alternative such as PWA or external build process).

existing_features.title: Promote the currently deployed preview build (reported as Version 55) to the live/production Internet Computer URL following the existing preview-to-production runbook, without introducing any code or configuration changes.

Complete pre-publish verification for the preview build and document the results in a version-specific promotion record markdown file under `frontend/docs/promotions/` (create `frontend/docs/promotions/version-55-preview-to-production.md` if it does not exist), including PASS/PASS WITH NOTES/FAIL outcomes, notes, issue classification, and the required attestation that no code/config changes were made.

After promotion, provide the new live Internet Computer access details by recording the production frontend canister URL and the backend canister ID in a deployment record under `frontend/docs/deployments/` (create a Version 55 production deployment record if needed) and ensure the live links are discoverable from the documentation.

new_feature_requests.summary: Promote current deployment to the live IC URL
Provide an Android APK build for download/install (Android app packaging)

projectName: Promote current preview deployment to live Internet Computer URL (production)
